# --- OS Specific ---
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# --- Unity Generated Folders ---
Library/
Temp/
Obj/
Build/
Builds/
Logs/
UserSettings/
MemoryCaptures/
Recordings/

# --- Unity Cache & Packages ---
*.unitypackage
*.package
*.cache
/*.unityproj
*.collabignore

# --- VS / Rider / MonoDevelop ---
.vscode/
.vs/
.idea/
*.sln
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.pidb
*.user
*.userprefs
*.booproj
*.svd

# --- Generated Files ---
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.pidb
*.symbols.zip

# --- Auto Build Artifacts ---
*.apk
*.aab
*.ipa
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.keystore

# --- Crash / Reports ---
crash/
*.stacktrace
*.dmp

# --- ShaderCache (URP/HDRP) ---
ShaderCache/
*.shaderGraph.meta

# --- Build Cache (Optional) ---
Library/Bee/
Library/Artifacts/
Library/ScriptAssemblies/
Library/PackageCache/

# --- Asset Store Packages ---
Assets/AssetStoreTools*
Assets/Plugins/Editor/JetBrains*

# --- Ignore Local Settings ---
ProjectSettings/ProjectVersion.txt
ProjectSettings/EditorBuildSettings.asset
ProjectSettings/QualitySettings.asset

# Optional: Keep Scenes & Assets
!Assets/
!ProjectSettings/
!Packages/
